## IndentWriter class

Indent writer for streaming text processing.

Adds indentation at the start of each line while preserving ANSI escape sequences correctly.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class IndentWriter 
```

## Example


```ts
const writer = new IndentWriter(4);
writer.write("line 1\nline 2");
console.log(writer.toString());
// "    line 1\n    line 2"
```
